Back to Franz Schubert

Franz Schubert

Sixteen deutsche Tänze and two Ecossaises, D 783

1823–1825 · op. 33

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 10'

  • 1. Sixteen deutsche Tänze, no. 1 in A major
  • 2. Sixteen deutsche Tänze, no. 2 in D major
  • 3. Sixteen deutsche Tänze, no. 3 in B-flat major
  • 4. Sixteen deutsche Tänze, no. 4 in G major
  • 5. Sixteen deutsche Tänze, no. 5 in D major
  • 6. Sixteen deutsche Tänze, no. 6 in B-flat major
  • 7. Sixteen deutsche Tänze, no. 7 in B-flat major
  • 8. Sixteen deutsche Tänze, no. 8 in E-flat major
  • 9. Sixteen deutsche Tänze, no. 9 in C major
  • 10. Sixteen deutsche Tänze, no. 10 in A minor
  • 11. Sixteen deutsche Tänze, no. 11 in G major
  • 12. Sixteen deutsche Tänze, no. 12 in C major
  • 13. Sixteen deutsche Tänze, no. 13 in C major
  • 14. Sixteen deutsche Tänze, no. 14 in F minor
  • 15. Sixteen deutsche Tänze, no. 15 in A-flat major
  • 16. Sixteen deutsche Tänze, no. 16 in F major
  • 17. Two Ecossaises, no. 1 in B minor
  • 18. Two Ecossaises, no. 2 in D major

Recommended editions

  • Neue Schubert-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · VII/2/6 · BA 5529 · Tänze I · ed. Walburga Litschauer [deutsche Tänze nos. 1, 2 (two versions), 6 (two versions), 7–9 and 16, with further incipits for nos. 2, 8–9 (versions for piano duet) and 12]
  • Neue Schubert-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · VII/2/7 · BA 5530 · Tänze II · ed. Walburga Litschauer
  • Associated Board · Thirty-three Dances · ed. Howard Ferguson [deutsche Tänze nos. 1–7 and 10]
  • Henle · HN 76 · Sämtliche Tänze / Band II · ed. Paul Mies
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50021 · Sämtliche Tänze für Klavier / Band 1 · ed. Alexander Weinmann

1. Sixteen deutsche Tänze, no. 1 in A major

A version of this dance is also used as the second of the twelve deutsche Tänze (D 790).

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 2.5

2. Sixteen deutsche Tänze, no. 2 in D major

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 2

3. Sixteen deutsche Tänze, no. 3 in B-flat major

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 2

4. Sixteen deutsche Tänze, no. 4 in G major

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5

5. Sixteen deutsche Tänze, no. 5 in D major

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 2

6. Sixteen deutsche Tänze, no. 6 in B-flat major

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 2

7. Sixteen deutsche Tänze, no. 7 in B-flat major

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 2

8. Sixteen deutsche Tänze, no. 8 in E-flat major

Schubert made an arrangment of this dance for piano duet; except for a small incipit, the arrangement is lost.

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 2

9. Sixteen deutsche Tänze, no. 9 in C major

Schubert made an arrangment of this dance for piano duet; except for a small incipit, the arrangement is lost.

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 2

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 2

17. Two Ecossaises, no. 1 in B minor

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 1.5

18. Two Ecossaises, no. 2 in D major

A version of this dance is also used as the first of the twelve ecossaises (D 781).

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 1.5
